mapper.insert: insert into basicmovie(basicmovie_seq, title, eng_title, genre, director, actor, year, nation, trailer, pub_date, watching_rate, play_time, story, thumnail, keyword, user_rating) values(BASICMOVIE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{eng_title}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{year}, #{nation}, #{trailer}, #{pub_date}, #{watching_rate}, #{play_time}, #{story}, #{thumnail}, #{keyword}, 0)

insert into lowpricemovie(lowpricemovie_seq, title, eng_title, genre, director, actor, year, nation, trailer, pub_date, watching_rate, play_time, story, thumnail, keyword, user_rating) values(LOWPRICEMOVIE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{eng_title}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{year}, #{nation}, #{trailer}, #{pub_date}, #{watching_rate}, #{play_time}, #{story}, #{thumnail}, #{keyword}, 0)
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum r, t.* from
(select * from basicmovie
(select * from lowpricemovie
and title like '%'||#{searchDTO.title}||'%' or eng_title like '%'||#{searchDTO.title}||'%'
and genre like '%'||#{searchDTO.genre}||'%'
and year between #{searchDTO.yearMin} and #{searchDTO.yearMax}
and nation like '%'||#{searchDTO.nation}||'%'
and director like '%'||#{searchDTO.director}||'%'
and actor like '%'||#{searchDTO.actor}||'%'
order by user_rating desc) t) where r between #{rowMaker.startRow} and #{rowMaker.lastRow}

select count(num) from
(select * from basicmovie
(select * from lowpricemovie
and title like '%'||#{searchDTO.title}||'%'
and genre like '%'||#{searchDTO.genre}||'%'
and year between #{searchDTO.yearMin} and #{searchDTO.yearMax}
and nation like '%'||#{searchDTO.nation}||'%'
and director like '%'||#{searchDTO.director}||'%'
and actor like '%'||#{searchDTO.actor}||'%'
)

select distinct nation
from basicmovie
from lowpricemovie
order by nation

select *
from basicmovie
from lowpricemovie
where num=#{num}
